review: Super slim gadget that pops right into your HDMI port.  I was up and running with Amazon Video and Netflix within minutes.  It had to run through the typical updates, but it was completed in 10 minutes.  What I love about Amazon's "Fire" line is the super sexy, classy packaging.  I thought Apple had the market cornered on presentation, but Amazon "Fire" is taking over in this area. I love the black packaging with 'Fire' orange accent.  Remote is very light and small.  Love the fact that the up/down/side to side circle bar on the remote is big enough for a good "press" of the fingertip.  Way to go again, Amazon!
author: PussyCatMalone "Feline325"
